title: where in the world is riot kayle?
body: certainly not in my skin library, anyhows for real made multiple forum posts and a support ticket no response except the generic link to the support page that doesnt actually work and we cant see, and i swear to god if i get a support link again I swear all staff on here is a bot.

replies.body:
We're dealing with the few cases of these still not getting out in support tickets, so I recommend remaining patient until a specialist gets back to you in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^

*boop beep boop*
